languages.text: "О чем именно вы желали поговорить, Лорд-капитан? Мне нечего ответить на ваши беспочвенные обвинения в конфликтах с командой — за все время пребывания на борту я не припомню ни единой ссоры хоть с кем-то из ваших людей!"

traits.locale_text: "О чем именно вы желали поговорить, Вольный Торговец? Мне нечего ответить на ваши беспочвенные обвинения в конфликтах с командой — за все время пребывания на борту я не припомню ни единой ссоры хоть с кем-то из ваших людей!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "What is it you wanted to talk about, Lord Captain? I have nothing to say to your unfounded accusations about my conflicts with the crew — I cannot recall my having a single quarrel with any of your people during my entire time aboard!"
languages.original_text: "О чем именно вы желали поговорить, Лорд-капитан? Мне нечего ответить на ваши беспочвенные обвинения в конфликтах с командой — за все время пребывания на борту я не припомню ни единой ссоры хоть с кем-то из ваших людей!"

traits.locale_text: "What is it you wanted to talk about, Rogue Trader? There is nothing I can say to your unfounded accusations about my conflicts with the crew — I do not recall a single quarrel with any of your people during the entire time I was aboard!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What is it you wanted to talk about, Rogue Trader? There is nothing I can say to your unfounded accusations about my conflicts with the crew — I do not recall a single quarrel with any of your people during the entire time I was aboard!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What is it you wanted to talk about, Lord Captain? I have nothing to say to your unfounded accusations about my conflicts with the crew — I cannot recall my having a single quarrel with any of your people during my entire time aboard!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What is it you wanted to talk about, Lord Captain? I have nothing to say to your unfounded accusations about my conflicts with the crew — I cannot recall my having a single quarrel with any of your people during my entire time aboard!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What is it you wanted to talk about, Lord Captain? I have nothing to say to your unfounded accusations about my conflicts with the crew — I cannot recall my having a single quarrel with any of your people during my entire time aboard!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你想谈些什么呢，舰长大人？你毫无根据地指责我与船员发生冲突，我对此无话可说。如果我没记错的话，我在船上的这段时间里，没有与你的任何一位船员发生过争吵！”
languages.original_text: "What is it you wanted to talk about, Lord Captain? I have nothing to say to your unfounded accusations about my conflicts with the crew — I cannot recall my having a single quarrel with any of your people during my entire time aboard!"

traits.locale_text: “你想谈些什么呢，舰长大人？你毫无根据地指责我与船员发生冲突，我对此无话可说。如果我没记错的话，我在船上的这段时间里，没有与你的任何一位船员发生过争吵！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿De qué quería hablar, Lord Capitán? No tengo que decir nada sobre sus acusaciones infundadas de conflictos con la tripulación. ¡No recuerdo ni una disputa con su gente desde que estoy a bordo!».
languages.original_text: "What is it you wanted to talk about, Lord Captain? I have nothing to say to your unfounded accusations about my conflicts with the crew — I cannot recall my having a single quarrel with any of your people during my entire time aboard!"

traits.locale_text: «¿De qué quería hablar, Lord Capitán? No tengo que decir nada sobre sus acusaciones infundadas de conflictos con la tripulación. ¡No recuerdo ni una disputa con su gente desde que estoy a bordo!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「何をお話しされたいのですか、ロード・キャプテン？乗組員との軋轢について、根拠のない非難をされても何も言うことはございません。乗船中、あなた様方の従者と諍いを起こした覚えは一度もありません！」
languages.original_text: "What is it you wanted to talk about, Lord Captain? I have nothing to say to your unfounded accusations about my conflicts with the crew — I cannot recall my having a single quarrel with any of your people during my entire time aboard!"

traits.locale_text: 「何をお話しされたいのですか、ロード・キャプテン？乗組員との軋轢について、根拠のない非難をされても何も言うことはございません。乗船中、あなた様方の従者と諍いを起こした覚えは一度もありません！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Worüber wolltet Ihr sprechen, Lord Captain? Ich habe zu Euren unbegründeten Vorwürfen bezüglich meiner Konflikte mit der Crew nichts zu sagen – ich kann mich an keinen einzigen Streit mit einem Eurer Leute während meiner gesamten Zeit an Bord erinnern!"
languages.original_text: "What is it you wanted to talk about, Lord Captain? I have nothing to say to your unfounded accusations about my conflicts with the crew — I cannot recall my having a single quarrel with any of your people during my entire time aboard!"

traits.locale_text: "Worüber wolltet Ihr sprechen, Lord Captain? Ich habe zu Euren unbegründeten Vorwürfen bezüglich meiner Konflikte mit der Crew nichts zu sagen – ich kann mich an keinen einzigen Streit mit einem Eurer Leute während meiner gesamten Zeit an Bord erinnern!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « De quoi souhaitez-vous parler, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Je n'ai aucune intention de commenter vos accusations déplacées au sujet du soi-disant conflit avec l'équipage. Je n'ai pas souvenir d'avoir eu la moindre querelle avec vos gens depuis que je suis à bord ! »
languages.original_text: "What is it you wanted to talk about, Lord Captain? I have nothing to say to your unfounded accusations about my conflicts with the crew — I cannot recall my having a single quarrel with any of your people during my entire time aboard!"

traits.locale_text: « De quoi souhaitez-vous parler, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Je n'ai aucune intention de commenter vos accusations déplacées au sujet du soi-disant conflit avec l'équipage. Je n'ai pas souvenir d'avoir eu la moindre querelle avec vos gens depuis que je suis à bord ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ne konuşmak istemiştin Lord Kaptan? Mürettebatla aramdaki çatışmalar hakkındaki asılsız suçlamaların üzerine söylemek isteyebileceğim hiçbir şey yok. Gemide bulunduğum süre boyunca emrindeki herhangi biriyle aramda tek bir münakaşa dâhi yaşanmadı!"
languages.original_text: "What is it you wanted to talk about, Lord Captain? I have nothing to say to your unfounded accusations about my conflicts with the crew — I cannot recall my having a single quarrel with any of your people during my entire time aboard!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne konuşmak istemiştin Lord Kaptan? Mürettebatla aramdaki çatışmalar hakkındaki asılsız suçlamalar üzerine söylemek isteyebileceğim hiçbir şey yok. Gemide bulunduğum süre boyunca emrindeki herhangi biriyle aramda tek bir münakaşa dâhi yaşanmadı!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
